lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role! Trinket's Honey Heist! Oh my god. I would like to start off by saying that this is terrifying. And that's it! So, let's get to our announcements really fast. I believe we have a sponsor, right, Sam Riegel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry about that. It's a long one, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were so prepared. I don't feel well anymore.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I hope that the audio of that stuff didn't end up on the stream, and they just saw you going, "Marvel Puzzle Quest!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be amazing. Sorry it took so long, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Merch! Laura knows what's up, isn't that right--? Oh, Matt, you want to do merch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi! I mean, the big news is that today, available, we have the art book!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so beautiful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's full of stars.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh hi, Sam, have you seen our art book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I haven't!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't open it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We cannot open the art book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You still can't even open it, now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not going to show the audience the insides! Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Show them one page?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One page? I don't know. We'd have to have clearance or something, isn't that how it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will provide clearance

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They can sue Matt Mercer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess, I guess. Shit, man. Let's do this Percy page, this bomb-ass double Percy spread. Ooh! (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty bomb-ass!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this gorgeousness!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Security's coming down, they're going to shut us down. Close it, close the book!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Rachel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take the heat for it. Yeah, so that's up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're beautiful and amazing and fabulous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I heard there was a bit of an issue earlier today? A kerfuffle with international shipping? But that has since been fixed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we have more or less evened that out now, so there's currently a standard rate, I believe, for international shipping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for people who've already paid, I believe we're getting that fixed. Most today, and some tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's a few that are a little tricky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does it get so weird about books?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's weird. They were showing me charts and graphs to explain what happened this morning, and it was all very complicated, but it basically boiled down to our standard Benny Hill ridiculousness.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing Yakety Sax)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We have this shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! That's Matt Mercer with white sunglasses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No flesh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An absence of Matt Mercer.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The coolest Kanye West sunglasses on you've ever seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're a little broken, but they work fine for the image.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also have the scarves, although none of us have the scarves on right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You will see the scarves during the break.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And many other things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go to the shop. There's lots of shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The d20s are in. The new Vox Machina d20s are in the shop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget to watch Brian's stupid show, every Tuesday night.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't forget to watch Brian's stupid show before it gets canceled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, we have a weird announcement that came up pretty fast, as of yesterday. We are married.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We did get married. That's a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Sam clinking his mug)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I cannot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a deep cut inside joke, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Force Grey is coming up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, not this Saturday, but the Saturday after that. November 18th, I think? Yes. We're doing the Force Grey finale for season two in New York. Tickets are available. You can go to the official Dungeons & Dragons Twitter, or my Twitter, for information. With fantastic guests like Deborah Ann Woll, Joe Manganiello, which you've seen here on the show, Dylan and Utkarsh are going to be back from the series, and we have our fifth player to announce!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm jumping in as of yesterday! Yeah!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I didn't think they had that kind of budget!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need one more person! We're down a player! So I am playing a tortle named Clarapin the therrapin. Pretty stoked. Or maybe it's terrapin, I don't know. It's still new. I'm still working it out in my head. But I think we have a picture of Clarapin. There's no vetting monitor, nothing, over there. Ooh! Aah! That's good old Clarapin! She's a bard!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They just ran a picture of Squirtle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they totally could have. Teenage Mutant Ninja-- And moving on from that, the Critical Role podcast is up to episode 70. You can get it on Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Echo Plus, as well as Alexa-enabled devices, as well as other-- I should've read the top of that, "Is now "available through Amazon Alexa." That was the top part of that. Vox Machina: Origins is still out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're coming up on another issue pretty soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next few weeks, issue three is going to be out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But hey, there's a comic book. We're in it. That's a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have our big Critical Role wrap-up on the 14th.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes, that is going to air on the 14th, which is a Thursday night, at 7:00, in this very timeslot, on these very networks. Both Twitch and Project Alpha. We will be breaking up the Vox Machina journey into five sections. So we announced on Tuesday night that the first posts are up if you want to submit questions for episodes one through, I believe it's 23. In the wrap-up episode, we're going to discuss all kinds of stuff. We're going to let you guys ask Matt all kinds of things. You guys are going to get to ask each other. We're going to squeeze as many secrets out of this delicious man's body as we can, by any means necessary. I have ordered many medieval torture devices. Gummy bears. All kinds of good stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, she left. Couldn't take the heat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hole in the studio floor. She went down it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: So yeah, submit questions on the Reddit or at the Talks Machina Twitter account, or Facebook page, or the Alpha forums.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct. And then, of course, me, Taliesin, Matt, and Liam are going to be at PAX Unplugged next Friday. Wednesday Club, still a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still a thing. We haven't actually decided what we're doing next week yet, because it all depends on who's going to be joining us. We have a couple invites out to people, so we're waiting to hear. It'll be fun no matter what.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When's the Moon Knight episode?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to do a Moon Knight episode?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I would come on for a Moon Knight episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll talk about Moon Knight. I love Moon Knight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Spider Ham?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Peter Porker? The Spectacular Spider-Ham? We can do a full animals episode. That would be a lot of fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be great. You sang in a Blizzard promo for a new expansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An upcoming Hearthstone expansion. Kobolds and Catacombs, which references another cool game that sometimes people play.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not today, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, yeah, of course. But yeah, they had me sing the announcement trailer, which you can check out online and poke fun at me being a silly voice-in-the-void minstrel bard about making your way through catacombs filled with kobolds. So check it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your response via text when we texted you that that was happening was adorable. "Oh, "that's what that was. I suppose that's happening now."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't know they were announcing it at BlizzCon. It was just like, oh, on the opening ceremonies screen.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Were you in there when they did that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We were driving at the time. I was like, "What is going--?! Oh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were sitting, listening, and we both started squealing really loudly.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, that looked really fun. I saw they brought in Darin De Paul on a big throne that they were all carrying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is the mayor of BlizzCon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blizzard can afford it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I would like to give a huge shout-out to Grant Howitt, who is the writer and the producer of Honey Heist, as well as several other silly RPG one-shot games. You can get this for free. That's the amazing thing about this. He publishes all of his games for free. You can support him, which we highly recommend you do, at patreon.com/gshowitt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: H-O-W-I-T-T.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and if you can join his Patreon, you get some cool stuff that you might see. So yeah. Anyway. I think, oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's weird! It feels weird, doesn't it?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Say it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you say? Like, "Without further ado"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, you've only seen it every week for the past two and a half years!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Serious, serious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where we last left off, didn't happen. So we'll jump right in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any rules to go over?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Should I go over rules now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I figured, that way we can go right into the narrative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, where we last left off was rules--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop backseat DMing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm trying to help! It's her first time-- I'll shut up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You start the game with three points in each of the stats. This is a d6-based game, so whenever you do anything remotely bear-related, you're going to roll your bear stat. You want to try and get the number equal to or under how many points you have in bear. Criminal is anything, basically, not related to being a bear. That's quite literally, actually, what it says, "Not to do "anything directly related to being a bear." Same thing. Equal to or under. Right? If the plan's going well, I can reward you with a point in criminal. You move a point from bear over to the stat. Conversely, if you start getting a little aggravated, or the plan starts not working out in your favor, you might move a point from criminal into bear, the more frustrated you get. If you reach six points in either stat, you either turn into an insane criminal mastermind, betray the party, and decide to bounce, or you go completely feral as a bear and can't really function being a criminal anymore, and you're out. So you don't want that to happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any other way to die? Like, if you fall off something, do you die? What happens?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't jump off any cliffs is my recommendation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get more frustrated from jumping off a cliff. You become more bear-like. Cliffs can't kill bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. It's very cartoonish. Cartoon physics. Just don't look down if you decide to walk off a cliff.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Do forest fires kill bears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they don't. That's why he has to keep telling us to fight them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you feel like you're starting to get a little too bear-y, you can flash back to a criminal planning sequence in order to move a point from bear into criminal. If you're feeling a little too shady, you can eat a nice little snack of honey to move a point from criminal back into bear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have a Batman belt with honey stashed on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to find it and eat it? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what you guys are good at. All right, I think we get started.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (bear roar) Ease into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No wookiees. Hereby ban on wookiees.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, I should go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it's my plan to die in the first half of the show.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This isn't the zombie apocalypse. All right. It's autumn, two years after the defeat of the Chroma Conclave, in Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're in Westruun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those fucking assholes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I can't have you risking sneaking away and "giving in to your temptations again."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sad bear growl)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Don't get into any trouble. Okay? Happy bear." And she walks on down the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where am I at, right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are currently on the edge of the Bramblewood Forest, up on a mountain. You can kind of see Westruun in the distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So looking down at the city from a distance? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you know there's a lot of honey. As you turn around, you hear a few cracks of branches. There's a crowd of other bears. Seem to have been watching the whole time. There's a panda that waves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we speak English?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you can speak to each other. You can kind of mumble through words to humans. Yeah, you can, kind of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me? I'm Peddy Tuxpin. I'm new to these parts. I come from, you know, somewhere else. But I've been walking around. Checking it out. I like the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you seem a little fish out of water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They call me Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You a girl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am a member of Vox Machina, saviors of this land, Tal'Dorei, and beyond. You show me some respect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look at his junk. Hey, he's not a girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who are you untrustworthy lot, too, to be with this guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, my name is Cookie. I am a bear. This is my brother, Waffle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How you doing? Yeah, we just rolled into town, picked up this guy along the way. We don't speak for him, not going to give him any credit right now. Seems like an okay guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all hanging out here at the edge of the Bramblewood for no reason?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, man, we heard this town's got the good shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have heard right. All right. Three new bears. Three large-sized, normal bears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's another guy. There's one more guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I look around, and I only see the three bears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's one more.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm a little smaller.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He peeks out from behind Peddy Tuxpin.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: My name is Liam Las Vegas. I'm on a bender. That's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A honey bender?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm on a honey bender. I'm here with you lads, strictly for the honey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't let his personality defects fool you. He's a top man, knows his business.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, he's a total asshole, but he's really good at his work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's good at what he does, when he can do it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Started out as a bottom man, now I'm a top man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worked his way to the middle, mostly.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Middle man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Top of his field, as a middle man.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Top of the middle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worked his way from the bottom.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Started from the bottom, now we at the middle man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Top of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you hear the music in the background press on, all you can keep thinking about, Trinket, is that massive stash of honey hiding right behind the walls of the Hazel Festival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I look out. Do I still see Vex, or is she far enough away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's pretty far gone, at this point, over the mountain. She doesn't seem to be paying any attention to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and sense honey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll a bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Double die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get advantage, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. Wait, is this--? Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, right now, there's a lot of fried foods. You know at ren faire, when that mead smell and dirt? Kind of like that. That's all you've got right now. It's a little too much right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We probably want to get closer in before we start using the, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no, the nose ain't picking nothing up right now. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You begin to make your plan.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We should obviously get drinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say, first and foremost, like I said, my name's Trinket. I'm an adventurer. I've been through dungeons of all sorts and kinds. Used to scaring things off that are dangerous, in my way. I have no idea what the hell you're all capable of. You, panda bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The name's Peddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell me. If we're going to go into this city and we're going to reap the rewards of this honey festival contest, and I know where it is, what do you have to bring to the table, anyway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peddy, why don't you go ahead and roll a d6? This will determine your role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peddy. Peddy Tuxpin, you're the muscle of the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: About 10:00am, I eat. 12:00, I eat.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What do you eat at 12:00?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bamboo. 1:00 through 4:00 is naptime. 4:00 to bedtime is eating. Now, I lay this all out for you because I want you to know, what I do with those calories is I crush skulls. I break bones. I rough up people who haven't made their payments. I, well, we can arm wrestle if you really want a sense of what this Tuxpin's all about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peddy, don't hurt him.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He seems quite serious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a fellow bear who has immediately stared at my junk, I feel it is only right and fair that I accept your challenge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're going to do this! Paws up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (collision sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd say, roll a bear-off. You get advantage, Peddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Paw-wrestling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, a one is my better stat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I don't. I have a four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Without fail, Peddy, like a sprig of bamboo, snaps all the way back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! You okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we need some muscle. You've proven yourself worthy. Do I move a point for failing the roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're fine. Not yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pandas, they're fighters, not lovers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, we got muscle. What do you two brothers got at the table?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll d6s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to still also be a muscle, or would you like to re-roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, let's roll that. Four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Cookie, you're the brains of the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hacker bear!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we need a hacker for?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we write our roles down on our sheet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, write your roles down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me tell you, we've hit all the biggest places. We've hit Vasselheim. We have hit Stilben, okay. We've been to the Briarwoods' home turf, and we got all their fucking honey. We're going to get this honey because this fucking guy is going to hack the system.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can hack doors! I can hack people! I can hack cities, hack right through them.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Even with those stubby fingers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey man, you know how to hack? Then don't be talking to me about my business.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you know how to do, Liam Las Vegas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What exactly do you do, honey badger?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Re-roll.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No. No. No. Yeah! Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the driver.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, all right! I'll be the driver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your deal?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm the driver!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's our ride at? What are we taking this time?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Well, we've got a horse and buggy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to have to pick up a ride.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We're going to pick up a ride. Don't worry, I have super high criminal-risma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, Trinket, you're the last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it looks like we got a nice selection of abilities, here. So let me tell you what I have to offer. One, I know where the honey is. Two, I know the people probably around it. Three--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's anything-- A five? You're a thief.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that makes sense.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Just like your mom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me tell you. I've learned a few tricks from the two that raised me, so that honey's going to be as good as ours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like now would be a good time for me to confess that I don't really like, I've never had honey. I eat bamboo, mostly.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is it a gluten thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, I just haven't had it. Just don't have it much where I come from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You take the bamboo and you stir it around in the honey. You have them together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be good? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like celery and peanut butter. Don't knock it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Did you bring any bamboo with you, in a sack or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you bring any bamboo? Mm, nah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ate it on the way here. I eat a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also like to eat anything that kind of remotely resembles bamboo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to get hangry. You're not going to like him when he's hangry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us about this town? Where the honey is? What are we working with, here, buddy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now all we have to do is get inside, so, if you're the brains, what do you suggest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need some kind of distraction. We're going to dress as people. That's the plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dress as people? How's that going to work? We all look giant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket, your ears pick up in the distance: "Hats! Get your hats!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to immediately go: I think you're onto something! Cookie, Waffle, Liam Las Vegas, Peddy Bear, let's go get us some hats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's about a hundred yards away, entering into the south entrance of the city, about to cross the threshold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do we want to try and quickly and quietly make our way up behind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what do we see?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I would technically be the smallest, correct? Being a honey badger rather than a bear? I could maybe, if I need to slip by unnoticed, to grab a couple of things and bring them back to you guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right, here's what we're going to do, okay? Cookie and Waffle, we're going to fuck shit up, all right? We're going to get in the garbage, we're going to start fucking with people's shit. I might even scare a little kid. When that happens, you're in. You grab as many fucking hats as you can, and you skedaddle back. We meet up together and then we choose which hats we're going to wear, and which makes us look most human, or elf, or halfling in your case.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, but one question. Let me know any size preferences or style before. I don't want to come back and then have a big argument, and then I got to go back again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mr. Las Vegas, surprise us.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right. I can do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, Liam, you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Las Vegas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll call you Vegas. You're Vegas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Vegas strong, baby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vegas, you skitter on down past, using the rocks and the fauna to dodge as you get up close behind the guy. Cookie and Waffle, were you guys--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we split up. You take the bottom of the road, I take the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, what I'm going to do is I'm going to scare a bunch of little children. I want you to start tearing down the festive decorations that you see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want me to hack those decorations?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hack the decorations the fuck off the walls and make a lot of noise, Waffle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, it's going to be a loud hack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boss, you need me to do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone tries to stop us--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a suggestion, Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just going to say, be careful about too much mayhem. We don't want people to suspect there's bears running wild around the city. They might shut down the festival. Then the honey is-- So if you're going to do a scare, do it and get out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Waffle and Cookie? Flank from the sides. As you start getting up to the wall of the city, you see two guards standing at the entrance, nodding and greeting people, letting them go in as they go. You see a few banners hung up along the wall. Few flowers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a brief disguise. Going to hack a couple banners.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said there's a couple of soldiers, guards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Couple of guards, yeah. Couple of shields.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any kids in sight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's maybe one or two coming in, families coming in and filtering into the city for the festival. Most people seem to be inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Between me and them? Or are the kids open season, you know what I'm saying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kids are currently open season, yeah. You see a mom and dad, two kids, typical looking family out for a nice day. You see another kid going along in with one of the vendors. They've got some vegetables on their back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We wrap ourselves in these banners that I've pulled down. Then they won't know that we're bears. We'll just be giant flying banners.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They might think we're ghosts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They might be ghosts, and then they'll be prepared for ghosts. They'll never see us coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. They'll try to turn us and it won't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, ain't going to do a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Liam Las Vegas, as this is happening, you get up right behind. You follow in. You're about maybe five feet out from the back of Theobald the Bold, the best hat vendor in town. Theobald the Bold, is because his hat's the boldest. He's a little halfling dude with scrappy clothes, but his hat looks way overpriced in comparison to everything else. He's hunched, he's got a pull-behind wagon piled with hats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really leaning into it, isn't he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Get your hats! Festival hats!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go, Las Vegas! Go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hack the banners.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a double if you're a hacker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you're a little tangled in them. The pendants are getting in your face a little bit. What are you doing, Cookie?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While I get covered up, I'm going to start running towards the kids and yell as loud as I can like this (intimidating scream).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The kids (terrified screaming).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a shit and then I'm going to slap it at the grownups' heads that are with the kids. (screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, the dad goes, "Guards! Bears! Get help!" About this time, one of the guards looks over at the other one and goes, "Aw Glennon, we have a bear attack!" They start running after you, banging their shields against the spears going, (yelling) "Get away!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start flinging shit at them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Criminal is for flinging shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for bear. I guess you are being more of a bear than the brains right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the smartest idea that any bear has ever had. It's a two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You successfully fling shit. As the guards try to duck and cover, one gets hit right in the right eye and he's like, "Aw!" And they start jabbing at you guys with spears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take them out. We're leading them away from the hats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They chase you off, probably a good 50 or so yards off around the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll go into the woods, where you're supposed to poop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. As we're running, I yell: Hack the system!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I think those bears were rabid. Pretty sure, but we probably should have put them down." They slowly walk back. In this time-- how many hats?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How many do you think I could carry? Ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could probably do a few darts and hide a few in this time. Roll for criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay. Four. No good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, in the distraction--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Have I gotten any away yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you got a nice, solid haul. As you're trying to go for your bonus hats, Theobald turns around and goes, "Rats! There's bears and rats! Get out!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm not a rat, you piece of shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He stomps at you. "Aw, look, he knocked over my hats." Starts scooping up the ones.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I have claws, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little bit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Just want to get him in the butt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh right, attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you're attacking?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Just going to (boing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll 2d6 and roll for the lowest under bear. You have carnage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to poke him in the gooch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A one and a two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Theobald goes (yelps) and takes off running. A few more fall off and you take the extra hats.You guys all slowly get back. You reconvene. That actually went off pretty well, considering, so you guys each put a point into criminal. Waffle, Cookie, and Liam Las Vegas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we take it away from bear when we put it into criminal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take one away from bear, put it into criminal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're here! All right. How'd it go?

lines.name: LIAM, BRIAN
lines.text: We got hats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got hats and you smell like shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Does a bear shit on the Pope? I got hats of every kind you want. We got big ones, I don't know what I got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone roll a d8! A d8 please!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I need to borrow one. Oh wait, I have Marisha's Wyrmwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN, BRIAN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we got three sixes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three sixes. You two sixes reroll because this is the one hat that I only have one of.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peddy, this fez looks real attractive to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a second fez!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the best one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's inside the other hats. It's in one of the top hats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, do you want a fez and another hat then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll get a fez and one more hat, so roll again. What did you roll, five? Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled an eight again. It's me! I'm just going to roll the highest possible over and over again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What color top hat would you like?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, what are my options?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Black, green, and a leathery tan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, I'll take leathery tan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a gray one, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a Willy Wonka hat!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy fuckballs, I am a happy bear. Woohoo!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket, you get a trilby. What did you roll again, Liam Las Vegas?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is so confusing.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I did it just to fuck with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which cowboy hat do you want?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Holy fucking shit, you give me that one in your left hand right this moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get a second hat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get a second hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled an eight again. So now I rolled a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll again because a six is still a fez.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled an eight again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can put three hats on?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just going to keep rolling eights until something else happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What color bowler?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The green bowler. Been a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get to wear a hat on a hat if you want!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to wear a fez on a bowler.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fez on a bowler, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A fowler.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A fowler?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, you're that guy in a western.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just hacked that hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are feeling pretty good about your hats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is worth the price of admission, right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody get an organ grinder, stat! (sings)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sam looks like Beary Busey! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good code name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey Vegas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good job. With these hats, there's no way anybody in the town of Westruun would think that we're bears.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Had to poke a little butt to get them, but in the end--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Haven't we all?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The butt went away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have another brilliant idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got, Cookie?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We ripped down these banners. My brother hacked the system. They're really big. I can tear this shit with my claw and make each of us a cloak to go with our hats. Then we'll look even more human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are smarter than the average us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three years in bear college, my friend!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wait, how many years?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Getting hungry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, we've got some honey to get to. Come on, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With that confidence, you stroll right on up. See if you can test your luck with the guards, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to be the black cloaks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very distinguished! Very festive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stand up on our hind legs as vertical as we can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are hirsute gentlemen!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, can we go get Wet Wipes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep it moving! Bidet!

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: (growling) Bidet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Were those goliaths? Okay, let's go take a break." You successfully enter the city. Is my music going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going, yeah! I hear it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you get closer into the city, you can smell wonderful foods. You can see people bringing in prized vegetables and they're entering them into competitions. There's string quartets and people dancing in the streets. Mead vendors out in the open. As you get closer, you actually see a three-story-tall, really derpy-looking statue of a Westruun man with a cowboy hat, he's wearing a button down that looks a lot like the Texas state flag. He's got a shitty voice box saying, "Welcome "to the Hazel Festival! Welcome to the Hazel--" and it repeats every 30 seconds or so. Things are decorated around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're in a Johnny Cab!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cookie, Waffle. You notice the scent of honey wafting through the air. Peddy Tuxpin, you notice the scent of bamboo in the air. It's a little dried out and as you look down, you notice these little wooden bamboo sample spoons that have been discarded all over the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pick them up and eat them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It tastes like it's got honey residual on it. It's scraps, but there's some little drops of honey in sample cups.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peddy, people don't eat spoons off the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh people, we're people, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're people. Just grab them, hold them, and we'll find a corner for you to have a feast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pick them up. I pop one in my mouth like a sucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You guys taste some.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody act casual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a cigarette.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any of you boys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to pinpoint the source of the honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same. I smell gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm frustrated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you getting a little frustrated?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then take and put a point into bear. It's got to be lower than bear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in trouble there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bamboo's getting in there, it's mucking up the system, man. This is a delicate instrument.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, is this plan off the rails already? Should I be worried? I'm freaking out!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We got these great hats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These people are looking at us funny!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, you see an old couple run by going, "Help! Has anyone seen any cows? We "lost our prized steer!" She's like, "Gerald, I told you you should have tied them up!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is this shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As they run by, you see Pike way off in the distance. She's saying, "Anyone would like a "honey sample? Honey sample! Anybody? This is from the Slayer's Cake! Vote for the Slayer's Cake!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, we eat the gnome and then we get the honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody is eating the gnome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But she's so little!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's covered in honey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She will destroy you, trust me.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is she poisonous if you bite into her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, we'll go with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the other side, you see Reginald's daughter. What was her name? Aleria? It's somewhere in my notes. But it's Reginald's daughter and she's going, "Honey samples! Try it "from the Reginald farm! Honey samples!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one we could go towards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And kill her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to approach and tell the other guys to come along.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to talk to her? I'm freaking out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all right, just suck on your spoon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might just kill her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As I approach Reginald's daughter--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still really trying to find her. Damn, I just wrote down Reginald's daughter. Ameera or something? Aleria, or Amelia? We'll call her Amelia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I approach with my big bear arms at the side, my cloak over my armor and my delightful cap. Get close to the honey and (sniff).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She looks at you a little confused and goes, "Hello?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear voice) Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She turns around to a friend and is like, "I'm not one to judge, but--" She shuffles away, a little uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I took a bite of it, a little bit. I take the rest of it and hold it out and say: One of you bears, please, find the source of this goddamn honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Why did you give it to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said bears.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groaning) It's good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not bad!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like you, city bear. I like you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could do big things together. I smell honey, Waffle, I smell it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I taste it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going, "Yes! Vote for me! It's Victor! V "stands for voting! It's a secret recipe! Try my secret recipe!" Trinket, you get this waft in the air and you're looking at the honey, it's got this grayish tint to it. You recognize: this is the same smell that comes out of Percy's boom-boom tube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no. How many people are in the audience?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A decent amount!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A decent amount, people are all over the place, they're mixing in. They're going to Pike and then they're going to Victor, then they're going to Reginald's daughter, they're jumping around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First and foremost, considering the utility of that honey, I'm going to take a sample and pack it under my bear pit for later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Vote for V!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear voice) Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got an idea. I'm going to try something. I'm going to wander up to Victor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Hello there, hairy fellow! Would you like some honey?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dip my paw just a little bit and go, Mm!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Oh! You like it a lot, big guy? Okay!" And he starts scooping it into the hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With gunpowder honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's about a hogshead worth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About a hogshead worth. Easily have a hogshead there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Remember, vote for me, though! The V stands-- vote for me!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (amenable growling)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't spill it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody jostle any of these townsfolk too hard. They're probably a little sensitive at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little gassy, you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll see. We don't want that honey, we have enough there. The prize honey is what that little one had earlier. Or (squishing) where this came from.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: My goodness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't think about my hat at the time. I don't have pockets. I'm storing it in my bear pit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's Whitestone wildflower, touch of Feywild star iris. That's good. That's real good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, lead us on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sniffs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which direction are you guys going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a minute. You got a whole hatful of honey. Can I have a little honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You may certainly have honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going take a little bite of this honey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need this for later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's putting it in his mouth, I grab the edge. Are you sure about this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (swallows)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's good, all things considered. It's a little smoky taste to it. Still tastes like honey, just a little sulfury.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've had honey with jalapeno in it, a little bit of hot pepper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's gritty. It's got a little bit of crunch in your teeth.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Someone relieve themselves in the batch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More or less.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Texture. Does that put me back towards bear, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had some honey; don't we get towards bear if we have honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to have a nice pawful. You've got to get a-- a sample's not going to work

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's like, "Yeah!" They go rushing up to the stage.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I run up and start dancing with all of them, my drape flying everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drunk people are like, "Yeah, look at this little guy!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't be here right now! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listen! You guys. We have to get those fire dancers out of here or get the rest of these villagers out of the center here or we're all dead. That honey you got right there, that touches any of that boom boom fire stick, we all go boom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I run back over. You guys! You got to come up, oh man, it's crazy up front! Oh man, the honey's blue up there!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't go up there, I'm scared of fire!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see a roaming, free-wandering chicken that comes up and you can tell it's eating any and all trash that it comes across on the floor. As a spark of ash, a piece of flint flies off the fire dancers and falls in front of it. Chicken eats it mindlessly. (squawk) It explodes and bursts into a poof of feathers. Everyone turns, looks over in your direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got a plan. Do you have a direction where the honey's from that I gave you earlier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to smell it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please, for the love of god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! Yes I do! That way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can smell that it's coming from the Opal District a little bit, a really nice tavern called the Sun Kissed Inn in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys start heading that way. I'll catch up to you in a minute, I know where the Sun Kissed Tavern is. I'm going to try to save some lives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You bears split off into a back alleyway and start following Cookie and Waffle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was liking that guy, but I don't know. We don't need any martyrs in this group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the townsfolk are gathering around this fire troupe, I'm going to try to step between the threshold of where the various honey-eating folk and the fire spinners are. Step into that central area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the range on the Vex necklace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know where she is, so we'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, neither do I! She's real busy right now. People are dancing and they're cheering, they're eating the honey. Really stoked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they begin to encroach, I shake my head for a second, pull my hat and cloak off, and (roar) towards all of the townsfolk, away from the fire dancers. Attempting to use my terrify special skill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll 2d6 under bear and take the lower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two and a three!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone screams and takes off running into the other direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can tell a low level one person goes (groaning) and makes flame, but nothing really comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I throw the cloak back over my shoulder, take one of the fire sticks. Bidet! And start heading in the direction of the Sun Kissed Tavern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) She screams and runs off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do I have to move a point anywhere for that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a successful criminal action, so point from bear to criminal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good grabbing the stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm holding the flame stick with me now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see Pike, off in the distance, start looking and moving people out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I get as low as I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "What do you mean, a bear? What did the bear look like?" She is demanding from other people that are screaming in panic right now. You've successfully wreaked havoc. You hear a few guards call out, "Those bears got in the city! Damn it, O'Donnell!" Keep moving. The rest of you bears, you sneak off, go around, heading your way towards the tavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a bead on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I think I can hack it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to stick to the alleyways, we're going to make our way there quietly. All right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quiet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little guy?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vegas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take point!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 HB.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay. What else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just get ahead of us, look around the corner, see if anybody's coming. If there's anybody there--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Kill them immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're two feet tall; don't kill them immediately, just give us a signal!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And then they get on the ground, and then I go at the neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good thing you're a good at pulling thorns out of our paws, I'm telling you, Vegas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Suck poison out, too, if I really needed to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get up there, earn your fucking keep.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay! I run over and crawl down to the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn honey badger don't need any lip.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Eh, shut up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peek around a corner, look left, look right. You see a discarded wheelbarrow, a few discarded carts, some trash.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I want a cart. I'm the HB Driver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a wheelbarrow. Looks tinier, made of wood, but you might be able to maneuver it. It looks like a little kid wagon, is basically what it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vegas, what you got up there?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm looking for one that looks like the A-Team van!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that-- no! I'm not from around here. I'm an out-of-towner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bee-Team, come on!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There's some carts and a wheelbarrow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A cart?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can lift a cart.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay. Take the cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You push on the cart a little bit. Wheel falls off and collapses. Looks like it's been there for a while. As it collapses, behind that is a shiny, chrome metallic, little black detailing racing stripes on the side-- It's like a little Radio Flyer wagon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it say de Rolo on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It, in fact, does say de Rolo on it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, so there's some really shiny shit here. I'm going to use extreme caution bringing it down the hallway. I'm going to move all the shit out of the way and pull it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vegas, are you sure you can maneuver this thing? You seen something like this before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll a criminal check as you're trying to be stealthy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing looks complicated.

lines.name: LIAM, BRIAN
lines.text: How big is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bigger than a honeypot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's bigger than a honeypot. It's a Radio Flyer, it's a little wagon!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's big enough for Vegas, but not for a bunch of bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Success? You shift some things aside. You hear a rustle from the house. Don't move for a second. "George! George!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Who the fuck's George? Do we know who George is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Goddamn my piece of shit husband." She wanders off. You can continue.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (low scraping).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (squeaking) Liam Las Vegas comes back.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Guys, look! Behold!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What we do with that?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We can put honey in it! And if someone gets injured, we could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Put their honey in it so they can focus on walking!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's really smart!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my honey in the wagon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that really frees me up. Good thinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're all stealthing, keep moving down the alleyways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wagon with a fez full of honey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking for anything that looks like bamboo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a few foliage and trees that look bamboo-y.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll eat them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a few cattail rods and fronds that are not too bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have the city bear back yet, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not yet. Actually, about this time, as you guys come around the corner you run, coming down the alleyway, right into Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's up, big guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened? There was a lot of commotion back there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't worry about it. We need to get to the tavern. I look down and see the fez in the cart and I hold the fire rod away.

lines.name: SAM, BRIAN
lines.text: What's wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Safety tip: this doesn't touch that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an important safety tip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get that thing away from me; I don't like fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's wearing a fez, too, you don't want to get that anywhere near that. It's very flammable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I point again and say, this also doesn't touch that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't like to burn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember that chicken?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh-huh. What, are you saying there's a correlation?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You ate the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep leading us on with that beautiful nose of yours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's a question: How do you spell Sun Kissed? And I can't read.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's keep following the smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe it's got pictures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of one of the side alleys, as you guys are having this conversation, you hear (clopping). See that, I'm fucking Dee Bradley Baker up in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just self Dee Bradley Baker yourself?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I did! I didn't plan those, I didn't practice those ahead of time. It's not too bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a joke for 83 people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel good about that.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That was up there with all of Dee Bradley Baker's monsters for sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give that joke five bear claws out of five. Very nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see two silhouettes coming out of the shadows, also wearing hats. One has horns coming out of it. Two cows, also trying to pass as civilians, come up to you and go, "Well, well, "well! What do we have here? It looks like we got ourselves a couple of wise bears!" They're holding a stick like it's a tommy gun, but it's definitely a stick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Careful kids, they've got sticks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, friend. Let me ask you something. Are you one of those cow-cows or one of those people-passing-themselves-off-as-cows? Just to avoid confusion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you know what? Me, oh, this here is Bonnie." She goes, "Hi! You tell them, Cow!" He goes, "That's Bonnie and I'm Cow. We're tired of living like second-class livestock, you hear?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Point of clarification: They're holding sticks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're holding sticks. Like tommy guns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm pulling a Radio Flyer!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have digits!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I do, but still. Cows can carry things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's balanced. It's tucked up under.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a Far Side cartoon, just go with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beefcake! I don't think we have a problem here. There's not a lot of overlap: you guys like grass, you guys like ribbons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Oh, do we? Do we like grass? Are you going to start telling me about myself now? Look "at these guys, Bonnie." "Yeah, you tell them, Cow!" "Yeah!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You also like to be milked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "All right, you know what? You bears, you get to enjoy your honey. You get to enjoy all "these fruits and all these bamboos. And we get stuck with hay. And I'm just here to say we're tired of "it! Aren't we, Bonnie?" "Yeah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I step forward and crack my bear knuckles and say: If you're so sick and tired of it, why don't you make a move? Come on, let's end this right here. Let's settle it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Take a shit on them, Peddy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't shit where I eat!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Well, then shit on the one you're not going to eat!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! That makes more sense!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Is that a threat? Is that supposed to be some sort of hamburger threat? I get it! I'm a "cow, I've heard them all! All right. You want to throw down? That honey's ours. All right, let's "throw down!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did the cow just drop his stick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's my question. How much like bamboo do those sticks look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They look pretty good. They look like some pretty tasty-looking sticks. They're still green. He dropped it on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I lean over to Peddy and say: Disarm them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pounce with panda speed!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I throw myself on the stick and I bite it in half!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck 'em up, Peddy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you bite down on the stick--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Gnaw on that knob, Peddy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You realize this is actually a magic stick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! Is this true?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a spell I can do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a stick that, when you use it, it turns into a giant whacking trunk. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, that's this, yeah? When I use this stick, I become two bears?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Wait, what? Oh, I gave you the wrong one! That's what you needed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This makes much more sense! But I don't have to use it now, but have this item.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You now have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great. I can't bite it in half! I'll just hold onto it with my digits that I have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonnie and Cow go, "Moo!" and start trying to stampede you all. What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take off my cloak and I'm going to try and bull them out into one of the buildings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is all criminal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for being a cow hacker. You're cow hacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bovine hacking. Classic. I rolled a four, I do not hack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't fall for it. He tramples right over you. You get knocked prone on the ground. You get aggravated and take a point in bear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to grab Las Vegas by the scruff of the neck off the Radio Flyer and I'm going to try to chuck him on top of Cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'll get on there and I'll start going carnage, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do fastball special, land on top of him, get a nice little foam going in the mouth. It's good. Roll 2d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the driver; steer that shit!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: One and two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scruff is getting--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Eat more chicken!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He goes down pretty good. Bonnie turns and goes, "What?! No! You monsters!" and she turns and goes for you, Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she rears towards me, I get down and be as imposing a grizzly figure as I can, and give a very focused, centered roar right in her direction. (roars)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for terrify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with a two. I only have two bear right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She goes, "You'll pay for this."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your wounded boy, and don't cross a bear in a hat ever again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She grabs Cow and starts trying to drag him off. It's going to take time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to take a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty sad, actually.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Are there any sticks left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just the one stick. There is another stick. It is just a stick, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to eat the second stick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'd say you get a point in bear for that. You did some pretty good bear stuff this go-round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we also move a point into bear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would move a point into criminal, and you would also move a point into criminal because your plan succeeded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say, Trinket. You've got a great singing voice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boss, I know she's within earshot, but shouldn't we leave no witnesses? Do you want me to take her out of commission?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a fucking cow. Do you think she's going to go to the city council and report a bunch of bears? We need to keep on the task at hand: get the honey and get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she turns away, I take a quick glance to look at the back of her shoulderblades to see if I notice any familiar branding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from the old couple that Vox Machina saved their bears from being eaten from rocs.

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Their cows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Their cows, yeah. What did I say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Cows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The same old couple that you saw earlier, running through looking for their lost cows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I turn to Peddy and say: wait, I know these cows. We've talked to these cows. These cows are assholes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to show them what-for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finish them off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right! I'm going to go up and take my stick and knock Bonnie in the head with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you use the stick, and as you rear it back, it turns into a giant tree trunk, basically, that comes toppling down right on her head. Roll for criminal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I've got to roll well. Two!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, no. Bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Either way, I succeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (impact) A little blood splatters--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She had a tree fall on her. And then after a second, it goes back to a stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I thought it was a stick. That's on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is amazing! I've got a stick that makes trees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who would've thunk it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket, I'm going to make a proposal to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it involve honey? I'm starting to get real twitchy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boss!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you hear the part where this turns into trees?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't make any sense. I'm doing business, all right? Sit tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like this is a more momentous thing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't seem that important in the grand scheme of things.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Didn't it used to be a tree, anyway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep your mind on honey, all right, Peddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I know you're not used to holding things that size in your hand, but you need to focus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Las Vegas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the best at what you do, bud, but hold on. The big bears are talking business.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once we get the honey, I get the sense that you've got ties to these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More or less, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What say you run free with us? We could hit Vasselheim. We could get all the fucking honey of every temple in that city. The good stuff, after this.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We've got a cart to pull it in, and everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Slayer's Take's got to have fingers in dozens of bakeries all over town. Their honey pots are sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking as how I'm five points into criminal right now, I start nodding slowly, and go: all right, I hear what you're saying. You all seem to be a fairly functional lot. We'll see how this--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like this guy, Waffle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there was a honey pun. That's good. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People are still pretty cleared out of the town square from where everyone was looking for a giant bear that's now running loose in the town. You see a few knocked-over jars of the sample honey. It would be risky, but there's some honey not too far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's worth the risk. I've got to keep my eyes focused. My brain right now is caught up with the ideas of all the various other heists we could throw, and I've been a good person so far, a good bear, in my life. I can't deter too far from that path. I'll be right back. And I rush up to try and grab one of the canisters and bring it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why's he always leaving us like that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I make it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You scoop up as many as you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm jamming it into my mouth directly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move a point from criminal to bear, and I'd say you can probably bear-handle two more jars of honey, awkwardly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I come back and put it into the Radio Flyer.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can I eat some of it as I help him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Move a point. Does anyone else want to eat anything? You good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm all right. I'm feeling pretty in control, so let those in need scoop the honey first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm more of a bamboo person, honestly. I don't really-- I'm fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dip your spoon in it. Try it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Delicate. Nice odor. Has a forward nose. Jammy, but new-world jammy.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Jammy? I heard jimmy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's got a steely-oaky feel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the notes, man?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How old would you say it is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12 years, aged in barrel. Good mouthfeel. I like it! Hey, this stuff is pretty good. You know what this is like? Liquid bamboo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know how you can tell a panda bear is a vegan? It never fucking stops telling you about it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's Crossfit?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's when they run up and down the thing, and they're always talking about the shirts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, Vegas, we do Bee-90X.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, Bee-90X.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Focus! We've got honey hiding somewhere right now. I don't want you buffoons ruining our chance. They know there's bears around now, and I bought us a little bit of time, but we've got to hurry it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He talks a lot of sense. Come on. We've got to keep our eyes on the prize. We've got to get to this inn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You've got the nose, you've got the brains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a scent on it, Waffle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I still got a scent on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say you've still got a pretty good scent on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's this way. Bring the cart around!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (squeaking wheels)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hear a few guards in the distance, shouting. It's kind of inaudible. "Clear!" Seems people are definitely looking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Snake? Snake!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've definitely put the city on high alert, for sure. Everyone roll a criminal check as you stealthily move through the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Succeed.

lines.name: MATT, BRIAN
lines.text: Succeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I failed big time. I rolled a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. What about you, Waffle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to roll, but first, I was going to think about the last time we were in a tricky situation like this.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Ugh, here comes one of grandpa's old stories.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I remember we were doing a roll through Whitestone. There was high alert.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flashback! (flashback noises)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were trying to book our way through the main square towards that big tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goddamn tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tree can give you a little coverage, but not nearly enough. That cart came by, and we kept walking right behind the horses on the cart. No one suspected a thing. They were sitting there, minding their own business, making noise like, "Bears! Look out, bears!" They didn't see a damn thing coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done. Out. Honey got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ba-da-bing. Can I get a point of criminal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can get a point in criminal back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that save all of us, or just him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just him. I'd say, if you want to switch a point, since you were part of that, go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it goes...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From bear to criminal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honey: criminal to bear. Don't know why I'm still-- boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it actually gives you a pretty good idea, Waffle. Since the town is kind of empty right now, you walk by a little news stand that has tobacco and hand-rolled cigarettes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sweet syrup, I got me an idea. Hold on. I walk up. Just trying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pull a cigar together, basically. Trying to stealthily grab a couple cigars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'll allow it to just happen. Just because of the ridiculousness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to light a couple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I go to get the fire staff from the ground, pull it back, pull my cloak back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
