lines.text: It's an obnoxiously large flame for what you're trying to do, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. It's fine. Now--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last time you did this, you got stoned for three days on the outskirts of Kraghammer. I had to talk you out of that tree. Took me three fucking days!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it worked, didn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have yourself in control?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. Right now I feel (grunts).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moderation. Moderation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feeling good. Feeling fine. So... now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead and put another point into criminal from bear. It's pretty good. It feels pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. No, smoking. Honey blazed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you come around a corner, down an alleyway, you see a little kerfuffle going on and you see two bigger kids just sucker-punching on this little kid and they're taking honey samples and smearing it in his hand. A lot of it, it's Victor just smearing it into his hair. You hear the kid screaming, "Hey! Hey! Stop it! Stop it, you guys! "Seriously, my dad's going to kick your butt!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I run over there and smack one of the kids in the back of the head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was like, (sneering) "Ah!" Turns around.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Stop it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Shit, you guys! Hey Jordan. Jordan, look, it's a ferret! Let's capture him!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm not a ferret, you piece of shit! Get away from him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The kids start trying to capture you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, that's fine. I just start fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Killing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for carnage.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Carnage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run out and help him. I'm going to jump the other kid.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (shouting) I don't like bullies! It's a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you have advantage because it's carnage.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, then you have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead, roll for bear plus one.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I fail. Does that mean I fail? Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I failed hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We both failed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other kid turns, sees you. He's like, "Oh "shit! Shit, Jordan, it's those bears!" And starts taking the wooden play sword that he got at the festival and just starts beating you with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hack that sword in half! I'm going to come running up and hack that sword in half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a point in bear. Also take a point in bear. As the kid's holding you and you're just (struggling sounds).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just sit back and watch with Peddy, smoking the cigarette that Waffle gave me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hack that sword in half.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is not how it went in the after school special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you going to hack that sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With my claws. I'm going to hack it in half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're really pushing that hacker thing, aren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what you gave me, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, once again, I'll allow it based on the shitty English language.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. That's how I get away with almost everything in my life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two dice, under bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two dice, under bear. I do it! I hack the sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. The sword breaks in half. He's like, "Oh, shit, it's the other bear!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been hacked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "What? I feel like--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say it! Say you've been hacked! I hacked you! Say it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "George, what's he trying to say?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (bear sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he's distracted--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a kid on my back, by the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're like, "Aw, shit, man. Come on, let's get out of here!" And they take off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I trip one of them as they run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Ugh! You just scraped my knee!" (crying)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Run, you stubborn prick, you! (manic laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Mum!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're dicks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you flick the cigarette, you see one of Victor's sample cups go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --(ignition sounds). It goes (sparking sound), like a bottle rocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Point of order. No one flick cigarettes. Especially if there are kids with it smeared in their hair. I'm so sorry. Which, the kid sees a giant hat-wearing Trinket going (bear sounds).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got this cowlick-- he's sore and he's like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hold the torch away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Wow. You know, I really feel like you guys are trying to talk to me. This is great! You "guys saved me! Oh, I got saved by bears! No one's going to believe me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "That's right, fuzzy bear. Hey, are you guys-- you guys want some honey?"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I know where there's a lot of honey."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the only word of English I know.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Tell us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Okay. See, my dad is the head of security."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Congrats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "He's the head of-- so he knows where all the honey is hiding and he told me that there's a "code and he made me collect a bunch of fish for it and it wasn't very fun. But there's a secret code! "I can tell it. I can show you where my dad is!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kid, how would you like to be an official bear bandit? (bear sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "It's so cool having bear friends! Okay, if you go around the corner and go up there, right "next to the Sun Kissed Inn. My mum likes drinking there a lot. If you go over, next to the Sun Kissed "Inn, there's an alley behind it and there's a door that goes up to the side, and that's where "the head of security is."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This kid. I like this kid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boss, you know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Okay. Have fun. Bye!" And he runs off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kid, wash your hair!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggling) "Mum!" And he runs off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to rub him out? No witnesses, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you had your fun for the day, all right?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Did you say rub him out? I have to say no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It got weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vegas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I remember this one time in Las Vegas...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, are you doing a flashback right now? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck do we do with that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. You're the brains.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I don't think we can take the cart up the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we can with the right muscle.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can carry a cart.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: A cart full of honey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Could you carry me too, like the old days?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would I-- what?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Remember when I was hiding behind you in the beginning?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone go back to eight minutes into the video.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to do a flashback to that moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you would like to.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. There's another guy. There's another guy here. You said three bears but there's another guy. Why don't you come out from behind me there, friend?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hey, it's me! I don't remember what I said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flashback. (flashback sounds) And you're back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someday we're all going to look back on this and laugh, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead and put a point from bear into criminal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you did that wrong, friend. No, it's bear to criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I was hoping it was gonna take a thing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you can always eat the honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then you also take a point from bear into criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'll eat some more honey too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Now you can move that point back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many more servings of honey do we have in the cart?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got a jar and a half.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they eating the hat honey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a half a jar per serving?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd say yeah, three more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't eat the hat honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, don't eat the hat honey. We only got three proper servings left so we have to be sparing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close are we to this tavern?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Well, we're going to go get a fuckton more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waffle, what does your nose tell you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sniffs) I don't know. I have no real perception of distance that is actually capable of being communicated to a bunch of other bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it like three glens or five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's close. No, it's like two glens tops.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two glens over?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds accurate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A glen. Maybe half a hill and a dale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, let's get close. I want your nose and my nose. I have a pretty good nose. The best noses. You'd be surprised! We get outside that tavern and try to figure out where in that building that honey is, it's probably in the tavern, probably in the basement of the tavern, probably in the back in the larder-- but let's check it out. Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And with that, we will take a break. As always, stay tuned for the wonderful Brian Foster's codeword so you can win some shit. I don't know what you're going to win, but you're going to win some shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's going to be a beautiful deck box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're going to take a break and we'll be right back, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Woo-hoo! Marisha Ray! (cheers and applause) [break]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome back... to Trinket and Peddy Tuxpin's Honey Heist. We have a winner for Brian's wood, which is HawkWinter01.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: HawkWinter!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sounds like a born winner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Sounds like a Marvel character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We drink to your honor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sponsored by Marvel Puzzle Quest. Got to catch them all. And then you, Sam, quick catch-up announcement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so next week, I will be hosting a one-shot. I will be in the Marisha seat, and my special guests will be: Amy Vorpahl, from Geek & Sundry. Stefanie aka Sofia Woodburn. Yuri Lowenthal, voice of things. Noelle Stevenson, writer of things. Molly Ostertag-- I hope I'm saying that right-- also writer of things. And back for more: Jon Heder! They will be having fun adventures and fairytale romance on the high seas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am genuinely so pleased that all of this is happening.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and if you've got time tomorrow night, we got the confirm that we're going to be singing and drinking on Gather Your Party tomorrow night, so we're going to be having a pub sing. You get to hear me sing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Forgot to mention One Night Only on Saturday. We're doing GM Tips. Me and Satine are hosting a GM Tips One Night Only, this Saturday at 8PM, I believe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got some pretty awesome people who are going to be on it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I told Satine. She's on board.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some bad breaking news. This just in: Laura and Travis actually tripped and fell into a giant vat of Tim Tams in Australia and were smothered to death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. They tried to get out, but Vegemite was poured on top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the only way to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was no coffee nearby.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It looks like Travis went mud-wrestling again, but unfortunately, that's not mud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Criminal bear posse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're right back in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right back in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our cloaks, our hats...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your cloaks, your ascots, your hats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our miniature Superman capes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your pull-behind de Rolo Roller.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking inventory here. Three sources of honey, an explosive honey hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A fez of explosive honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a fire staff and a tree stick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not doing too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a bad haul.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: A cart!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And a cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This could be yours, Trinket, forever and ever and always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm thinking about it, but still. You've proved to me that you're useful, and you've proved to me that you're partner material. Come on, brains. Lead us to this tavern. Follow your brother there. See if you can get us inside this security door.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (wheels squeaking) (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold up. I take a whiz on the wheels to silence them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for bear? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You successfully pee on wheels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I move the cart to change the wheels so he can keep a steady stream going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's it sound now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Much better. You are leaving a bit of tracks, but it dries in a while. It's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The people do that here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's Westruun. It smells like piss everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you guys keep moving, ducking down alleyways, turning and looking like bears and people as you need to. At one point, in the distance, you hear: "Oh no! We found the Jamesons' "lost cows. Hey, can we get a really big wagon?" That happens in the background. It has people distracted for a little bit, it seems. You keep moving. As you come around the corner, you see, across one of the main thoroughfares, the Sun Kissed Inn.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That looks familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sun's out. Feeling pretty kissy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks pretty fancy. Looks nice. You're in the Opal Ward right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a picture of the sun on the sign?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a nice glow coming up over the logo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go get us some honey. I'm going to go right through the front door.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? This is where the honey is, right? Come on!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: She said we've got to go see the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's she?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peddy. Peddy, I love you, but this is not your natural environment, even. You're not even a bear that's from these parts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I know. I'm from out of town, all right? Don't make me feel like-- fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the strongest bear in the group. We love you. We need you. But come on, let's take it one bear paw at a time, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You! Only you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, he's pretty much already almost killed one creature, but I get what your point is.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Cows do not like me. They do not like me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You apparently don't like them.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When someone calls me a ferret...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't insult your integrity. What are we, animals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you, though, seriously? Are you a mongoose or something?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, I'm not a mongoose. Do I have gills? Do I look like I have gills? I'm not a mongoose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. I should have seen: no gills.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm a honey badger!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a valid point.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (off-screen laugh) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your audience. One person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's case this joint, okay? Waffle! Where's the honey smell coming from in this place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sniffs) I'm trying to pinpoint the location of the honey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're getting some pretty strong wafts right through the front door of the Sun Kissed Tavern, for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we've come to the right place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Waffle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an exposed pipe here. Maybe you should sniff right there. You know, hack into the mainframe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't tell me how to do my business.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I hack the mainframe? (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't tell me how to do what I was just about to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's under criminal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last five years of video games have prepared me for this moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You get a good sniff, a good waft. It's a little musty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're huffing it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, my whole face is in the pipe!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go over and see rat droppings down one side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can see through the smell?! No, I love it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm painting a picture here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I love it! Keep it coming!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go through, and the smell comes from this dank air passageway over in the corner, but your scent leads you in another direction, and it jettisons to the left, and it goes up to the right, and you see up in this attic loft a security room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, there's a firewall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's all you can see, and it snaps you back into reality.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've got a firewall. I don't think they got me.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't take the hat near the firewall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're going to keep it very safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Point of order. Excuse me, BM. BM?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear master? Beast master?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bear master, bee master. Take your pick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take beast master.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you please paint a picture of the outside of this building for us humble bears?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got a main thoroughfare in front of you. Off to your left, you've got the town center, where you guys were harassing and terrifying people. There's a nice fountain in the middle of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where we did our expert plan. Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the upstairs, there's a little inn you can stay at, a little bed-and-breakfast. It's got nice white columns. A little swinging wood sign says Sun Kissed Tavern, with a sun rising up over top of the title.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about a side entrance to the security guard?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see an alley that jettisons off to the left of the tavern that looks in the direction that his hacker sense was taking him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't smell that. I wasn't there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's our best bet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got a catty-corner dart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wipe the huff coloring off the sides of Waffle's face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gold spray paint? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Careful. It ruins your brain.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You look like my aunt after church. Come here. Let me get this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little dizzy. It wears off in a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. This is good. You're telling me that the honey is not right through the main doors of the tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's deep inside. They've got it definitely under heavy security.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They've probably got some dipshit upstairs guarding it, around the back. That's good. This works in our favor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got an idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your idea?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Spill the beans!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I make a tree right in the middle of the lobby there. You use your fire stick. Set it on fire. The whole place goes up. Problem solved! Hey, I'm the muscle, all right? I don't come up with the plans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell you what. If everything goes ass to sky, that'll be our backup to cover our tracks, but we can't start with that. Hold onto it. It's not a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are no bad ideas, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, maybe we finally heard one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can we see, possibly, a stairway or entrance door to an upper level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can see the entrance of the alley, but you can't see down it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can see the stairway up to security guards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe. You've got to make it to the alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's get in the alley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got an idea brewing. Let's get a closer look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone roll for criminal to stealthily cross the street without being seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fail!

lines.name: BRIAN, TALIESIN
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three out of five, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going for a Matt Mercer skill challenge, where half had to do good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who the fuck is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half succeeded, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, half succeeded. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More than half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're an uneven number.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tie-breaker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an iron door on a building made of wood and plaster? What's the rest of the building construct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brick. Brick building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to take a look at that door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can knock it in.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: But it's already open! It's already open a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May be too good to be true. We go in there-- people, right? They're tricky. They've got brains and stuff. Their intelligence is at least eight or higher.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. He's the brains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we just go in there, it could fucking blow up in our faces. Maybe that's what we do; maybe we have no other option. Here's what I'm thinking--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: His plan is to blow up everybody's faces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't eat burned honey like that.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is honey flammable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does honey burn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honey absolutely burns.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What if we burn down everything, and the only thing that's left is the honey, and then we move all the bodies and scoop the honey into the Radio Flyer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not your fault you're vegan. You have very little experience with honey. Yes, the honey will burn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get just as much protein from bamboo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not saying there's anything wrong with it. I'm just saying it's real stupid, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, it's not my fault that I don't have to kill an innocent animal to survive like you fuckers do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You killed a cow back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cows don't count.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! We're all hungry. We all want some honey. Some of us want some bamboo-- that's weird, but that's okay.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Who's going through the door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the smallest. Just take a look.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I can check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's above the door? There are giant doors on the ground floor, right? There's no stairs up or nothing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to peek in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't. I want to understand what I'm looking at. Is it brick, stone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a little stoop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The building is more than one floor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's an inn with a tavern on the bottom floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it possible for a honey badger to climb up the side of this building?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, is there some piping or perhaps a beautiful Uncharted rope? Why don't you make me a tree, you druid?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a little window that doesn't seem to have much of a purchase, and then there is a balcony on the front of the tavern that looks like it leads to some suites.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sweets! Oh, not like candy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what I'm thinking, and we could rush in there; it wouldn't be the first time we've done that, Waffle. But here's what I'm thinking: one of us gets up higher than the door and waits, and you, Trinket, you speak people pretty good. You could fool people into thinking you're a human. So we send somebody above the door, you knock on it, draw them out, invite them into a conversation, and when they start talking, bam! Honey badger on their fucking head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why you're the brains. All right, Cookie's got it. Are we all in on this?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I like this one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need a tree?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No. I've got pipe. I've got suites! I've got a cart I can jump off of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cart stays here.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So as you bears are hiding in the alley, you take this pipe and climb up it. Roll for bear. Bear climbing.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Jesus fuck. Fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get halfway up the pipe, and it's too slippery, and you lose purchase, and you go (sliding noise) and slide all the way back down.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What was the other way up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tree.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can we try a tree? Hey, I had some--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never happened before.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This has never happened to me. I'm 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very old for a honey badger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're practically dead! 27?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I would take the stuff, but the last time, I was climbing for over four hours--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry we're disrespecting an elderly person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't eat the honey. Rub it into your flesh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not a bear, he's a prairie dog.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I am not a prairie dog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so you were not feeling too bad about falling off the post, and then these assholes started making fun of you, and now you're getting a little irritated. Put a point in bear from criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move a point from criminal to bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stand back! Stand back, everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, buddy. Have some honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: From the cart?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've earned it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boss, how has he earned it? He hasn't done anything.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I tried to climb a pole, and I failed, and you've been sitting down here taking dumps the size of Trinket! Eating all that bamboo. We've got to stop every five seconds pushing the cart so you can take a dump!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need him to find his mojo again. Let him have some honey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You kill that last jar-- the first half jar of honey-- to calm down a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to be swimming in honey any minute now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, Peddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You ready? Okay, stand back, everybody.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right, make me a giant wood to climb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I smash the stick down on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lopsided, and it crashes into the balcony a little bit, but it gets there and then gets a little tree growth at the end. It's not bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An oak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the fuck do you need, motherfucker?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A silver maple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What color would the bark be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brown.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lightish-brown?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this looks like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck it. I'm going to start eating it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You start gnawing at the base of the tree. As you're climbing, Peddy can't help himself.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I climb up, get to the bushy part, to where I can't be seen, and then I, real quick, pee down onto Peddy and say: Honey badger don't care!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get up to the top of the balcony.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I loudly whisper: are you in place?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes. Wait! Okay, I'm finished.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You scurry up the tree, peek in the first window. Empty suite, nicely made hotel bed.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Any honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Pretty empty.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They don't leave a little honey on the pillow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No honey samples.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turndown service? Honey service?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam! Liam, what are you doing up there?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I don't see any honey. I see a pretty nice suite. I would stay here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great. The plan is, you've got to teabag a guy when he comes out the door, so stop peeking in the windows now that you're done and get ready, all right?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to let the thespian here do his thing, then back off.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The room is empty, and empty of honey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is another window up further from it on the balcony.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is it climbable? I'll climb over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swear to god--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the door look like it swings in or out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It swings out?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And it's open a little bit, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's cracked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to stand in the cavity where the door swings so I'll be hiding behind the door when the door's open, just in case I need to deliver some muscle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Deliver some muscle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, gopher. Shut up.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Someone ask for muscle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop peeing on my tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shut it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody shut the fuck up, okay?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's not delivery, it's DiMuscle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, meerkat? Zip it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sorry. I'm going to go look at this other window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you in place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's doing something.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm going to check out the other window.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Inside, you see square scrying mirrors lined up along the wall. Papers, a writing desk, and a man in a security uniform-- Westruun colors, of course-- walking back and forth, pacing. Looks like he's talking over an earpiece.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hey! I see the future victim of my teabagging! He's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up there?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, he's in the window. He's got something in his head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, Trinket's going to knock. Tell us what he does when Trinket knocks.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay. But don't teabag him yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you get in trouble and need me to swing the door and cause some "panda-monium" -- trademarked--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We almost made it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Surprised that hadn't happened sooner.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I've got to call a guy after this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the signal? Give me a code word. Give me a signal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The codeword is... dollars. How about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dollars? Okay. Why would that come up in a conversation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. Figure it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dollars, dollars, dollars!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dollars!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thudding)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Las Vegas, you see him look over his shoulder, and he frustratedly goes, "Get on out of here. Go away! I'm busy." And he goes back and starts looking back into the mirrors, occasionally being like, "Any sign of them? Anyone find those goddamn bears?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They're definitely looking for you bears, that's for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thudding)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Ugh. Goddamn it." You see him leave the room. Trinket, you start hearing--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He's coming down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I begin to move a little bit off to the side of the door where it'll be opening, so only part of me is visible.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I climb into the room and under the bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're on either side. I'm going to push against the side of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's your criminal looking? Not too high, Brian. Not too high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I keep knocking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He goes, "All right, all right!" He throws open the door. "What, goddamn it?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Las Vegas!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you heard of our lord and savior of latter-day Allhammer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be goddamned."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make some dollars! Dollars! Dollars!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm coming down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going for it!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Attack!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. The poor guy gets flanked. From behind the open door, he gets slammed with an iron door to the face as a panda bear comes out from the other side, and right as he sees this big black-and-white face come around the corner, Liam Las Vegas comes from behind and gets him in the back, in the nape of the neck. Roll for bear. You get carnal advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Carnal advantage? That's a different skill.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Success!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a point in bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take a point to bear or off bear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A point from criminal to bear.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and very slyly snatch his earring in the commotion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, his ear's going to come off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may hack the ear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hack the ear? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try to hack the earring. I'm going to try and grab it and put it on my ear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, roll for criminal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With hacker advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Ear hacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Waffle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. The guy is thrashing around too much. As you go to reach for his ear, he immediately sucker-punches you in the jaw. Take a point into bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, if this is happening, I turn to Cookie and say: Hold him down. He's got a kid; we can't kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a kid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the kid that gave us the information.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Head of security!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had totally forgotten that there was any relation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm the only hero here, apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is like Captain Planet. You're Heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Liam, you hear-- Liam Las Vegas, you hear, since you're right up on his neck, you hear over the earpiece, very faintly: "Hey, boss? Okay, we're heading your way, boss. Boss, come in."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't come here! I am fine. I have no-- I am not in any danger! Everything is perfectly fine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Boss?"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is how he was talking before!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hear, "Boss Buford? I mean no offense, but have you been drinking again?"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Maybe a tiny bit. Look, it was a slow night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Buford slams you up against the wall again. What are the rest of you all doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to pull him off of Buford, as he's slammed Las Vegas into the wall. I'm going to pull Vegas off while I slam

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll for terrify with advantage under your bear stat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I succeed, with a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He goes, "All right. Just... I'll let you go."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I look at him, and I point with a bear claw and go, (grunts). And I take some of the honey from my bearpit and go, (grunts). Where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Did you just say 'where?' Holy shit."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I fucking hate this job, anyway. It's a piece of shit. Go get the honey, all right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wipe the honey back in my bear pit and pull him off to where the door is, where it's open, make sure that all of us are inside--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He looks at the badger, and he goes, "Here." He doesn't know what you're doing, so in another attempt, pulls out a honey sample from his pocket and goes, "Here!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (eager growling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he throws it behind your shoulder to get you to run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to grab the barrel and bring it in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're getting everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as soon as we get our last honey jar, the de Rolo Roller in, I shove him back out and close the metal door, and then try and find a way to lock it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you going to lock it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it digital?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Is there any sort of locking mechanism or a barricade?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty smooth on the outside. Seems like most of the locking handles are from the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any stuff around the room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did summon a giant tree trunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could. Wait, what did you say, boss?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's to stop the kid from squealing that we done just thrown out the door?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I ripped his tongue out before we left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Nah. I thought about it for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you're holding the door, you hear, (thudding) "Hey, come on!" from the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to make a trunk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peddy, knock him out. I open the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to bum-rush him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll two because you're the muscle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drag his ass in here, Peddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't matter. I succeeded on the first one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As the door swings back open, he's met with a giant panda bear head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (roars)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He gets whacked in the head and falls unconscious immediately.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can I search his body for more honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. You don't find any. You do find an old biscuit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How old?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not style. It's a little stale. It's an everything biscuit, like an everything bagel, but an everything biscuit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slayer's Cake. Everything biscuit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Isn't that the fraternity initiation biscuit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, gross.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: She said "everything biscuit," and don't say "gross" to me, Sam Riegel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where does my nose tell me where to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the Sun Kissed Inn, the entrance is out and through the front door. It's not. This appears to be separate, leading up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to get in. I want to take a look at that security room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You open the door. You look behind the guy unconscious on the floor. Are you going to do anything with his body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drag it inside and look for a place to stow it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Does he have any keys on his body?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Use him to prop the door closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He does have keys on his body, yes.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can I take those keys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can take those keys.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Put them in the de Rolo Roller.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: In case we want to go up to the honeymoon suite.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There seems to be a cupboard under the stairs, if you want to stash him there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to grab him with my teeth and try to shove him under the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a thin stairwell that goes up and opens up into a loft area. There's one door that looks like it was suite #1 and another door that looks like it was suite #2, where this was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A few notes, a few papers, binoculars. A few bottles of mead. Looks like Buford was having a good time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it honey mead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is honey mead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All mead is honey mead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but I'm a bear, so I have to clarify. Can I take one of the bottles and drink it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gulping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would say you put a point back into bear from criminal. You are a little tipsy, though, for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurred) It's fine. We're good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how terrifying you might be for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you haven't been around the right people and enough mead.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This reminds me, fellows, of the time Trinket got a little too drunk when we were all out at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this room?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughing) I need a flashback really bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just met this guy an hour ago.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Well, this reminds me of when my cousin Blinket--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who will also be portrayed by Matthew Mercer in the flashback? Sure.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Anyway, flashback.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was a bush baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so drunk and your cousin.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Ah, he's my cousin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm a cousin who's drunk.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, anyway, and sadly, we had to take old Blinket out back and shoot him, because it turned out he wasn't our cousin. He was brought into town by the circus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. Holy shit. That definitely qualifies as a flashback to being a criminal. Get a point back from bear to criminal. You're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take a look at this weird security system that they have here with all these mirrors. Are they viewing other rooms?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't it, though? Isn't it kind of fucking important, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's town square, tavern, cellar room one, cellar room two. That's all you need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what's on these papers here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what's blinking in the corner of each of these cameras. Mirrors. Scrying mirrors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I can hack these mirrors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, try to hack the mirrors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want them to run a loop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to throw them on a loop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to throw them on a loop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the bear work. Let him do his thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good. All right, hacker bear. Roll for hacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to mime keyboarding, but in doing so, it's going to somehow affect a magical spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got this, Waffle.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (singing) You came in like a hacker bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Double two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you're hacking, you get a waft of air from one of the vents off to the side, and it brings you back to the pipes in the tunnels, and in your cracked-out state, you somehow connect to the mainframe, and it takes you through, and you see the tavern, and you see two people passed out drunk, and you go through into the first room, and you see a few tripwires that seem to be strung out across the long hallway, and then you go into the last room, and you see three pedestals, with a bunch of honey stacked onto these pedestals. It's very dimly lit, but you recognize the shape of fucking honey barrels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Motherfucking honey barrels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Barrels? Did you say

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We hit the mother lode.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I don't know if I have room on the cart for all of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go back, and you see Matrix code go in front of you, and lights fly by.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a little green, a little black, like DOS.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm starting to believe!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rest of you see Waffle get a little nosebleed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waffle. Waffle!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About 30 seconds, same guard walks by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's on a loop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're clear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waffle's going to fight Sugarcone!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seems, through whatever magic that you have tapped into, you have been a little touched by the security cam. Security hacking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?! Wow. This is insane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to be able to see the honey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I get it. This will definitely not come in useful at all. This is useless and dumb, and I can't wait to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He comes back, and Waffle's got a little gloss to his eyes. A little bit of a green glow crosses them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've upgraded to Eggo.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You look more Belgian to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right, brother bear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get down there, or wherever we've got to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That I can't tell you, but I bought us some time.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Why is your voice so lame now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Hey, Peddy? Which one of these rooms has the tree outside of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was the one on the left, which is the first one that he went to. The empty one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll follow Vegas. Lead us to the tree. We'll climb down and go around to the inside of the tavern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, because right as you walk out onto the balcony, you see that guard who was walking through that you captured on your loop start walking around, going, "Hey, boss? Boss, you here?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, Peddy? Take him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is he? He's down below us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's walking under the balcony, looking like he's going to go around that alleyway, up to that door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peddy, teabag that motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I climb up bamboo, I don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I boot him out the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal aim, as you try to time pushing Peddy Tuxpin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, don't fuck me. One. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You accurately, with great precision, teabag this poor guard and fall right on top of him. He's not dead; he's definitely unconscious, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As he screams--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant tanuki flash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He quite literally does not know what hit him.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Next week's Wyrmwood giveaway is "pandasack." That is the new keyword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. Boom.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Write that down, Max.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, I landed on my nuts!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wasn't that the idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down the tree. Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another dose of high art from Critical Role.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to point that out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggles) You quickly and as swiftly as you can-- for a group of bears-- climb down the tree and dart and make your way into the front room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want me to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Might be handy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got it. What do we do with this body? Someone's going to see it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are now into the front tavern bar room of the Sun Kissed Inn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A valid point. The body of the guy who's unconscious that he just crushed. I pick up the body and look for the window of the balcony we were just jumping down from and try and ragdoll him up into it. (laughing) Arms and legs out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full-on Red Dead Redemption.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bear? I guess? I don't know.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Flinging a man through a window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His twisted pretzel body goes two miles, floating five feet above the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You miss, and it goes and lands on the roof of the storage room next door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the most immediately visible thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one looks up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. Sweet dreams. Goes back to catch up with them in the tavern.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He won't remember that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all are in the front room of the tavern. It's the late afternoon. There's no one in the tavern, anyway, especially now. There's one really old guy passed out in the front right-hand corner. Seems like he's been there probably since last night. You hear a commotion and clanking of pots and pans of chefs and workers in the back, in the kitchen, getting things ready for the evening, anticipating it will probably be a busy day in the Hazel Festival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I smell honey in the kitchen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's honey everywhere in this town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is honey in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any idea where the cellar is here in the inn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is drowned out by the smell of a stockroom of honey that is coming from the back left-hand corner of the tavern, which is the entrance to the pantry into the cellar. Guarding that front initial doorway into the pantry, which leads into the bottom cellar, is, with a pint in his hand, a passed-out Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog Strongjaw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Grog Strongjaw, of the Northampton Strongjaws? I don't know why I went there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Herd. Technically of the Emon Strongjaws?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If one of us bears made a history check, would we know who the fuck this guy is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He looks big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket recognizes him immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's black and white. And I will go talk to him in Panda, and I will sort this all out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're both probably on par intellectually, I don't know if that's going to end as--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's furry. He's got a little fur. He's black and white. He's my people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is he right in front of the door to the pantry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks like he was placed there, probably told to watch out for people coming in and out of the pantry, and proceeded to drink a lot and pass out instead. He's in a little chair, propped up at a bar table right to the left of the entrance, snoring loudly. No what?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There's cards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cards? Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to keep this as plan C.

lines.name: PA
lines.text: quietly make our way past.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quick question: which plan comes first? Is it plan A or plan C?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brains?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plan D comes first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why does no one value my opinions here? I feel like I'm offering good ideas--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When we need you to push something over, to dip your balls in something--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm thinking outside the box here, and no one's taking me seriously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will follow your lead--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that means!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't, either!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Vegetarian joke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one's going to respect that in the bear community.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: While they're doing this, I would like to go right outside the tavern and see if I can secure for us a getaway vehicle. Some type of mode of transportation, faster than a de Rolo Roller.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. As you peek out, there's a few abandoned vegetable carts. People that were there to sell their goods and their wares for the festival. There's one that looks like it was a pull-behind churro cart. And there is one cart that still has a horse attached to it that looks like at this point, he's eating all of the vegetables that are completely unattended right now, due to the pandemonium.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: So there's no one around it? I will go secure that cart and bring it to the entrance of the tavern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How would you like to do that?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Am I still dressed up as a fucking awesome-looking guy? Like a young Jason Charles Miller?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. You totally look like a young Jason Charles Miller.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean that a young Jason Charles Miller looks like a honey badger in a cowboy hat?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It sure does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm picturing a furry Great American Hero.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes! So I will cross the thoroughfare as suavely and slovenly as I can, and then I will approach the cart from the back so as not to frighten the horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can hear him. On the door that you guys came from that led up to the security room. You can hear him going, "Chief? Boss man? Hello?"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How far away from me is he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guy? He's far enough away. He's not paying any attention to you right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Does it look like he wants to go in there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's trying to get in, yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to go try to cut his throat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With what? With your claws?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, man, put him in the cement boots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get advantage.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Without any hesitation, he doesn't even know what came.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The honey's for me and my friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A theatrical amount of blood sprays on the door in front, and he slowly drops, smears down against the wall. He's dead.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh shit, he's dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's definitely dead.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: On the wall in the blood, I write,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Again? Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get a point from bear into criminal, for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My criminal mastermind brain tells me that this is your turf, Trink. I want to follow your lead. I see recognition in your eyes. You don't like this guy. What do we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I like the guy a lot, actually, but he might like destroying you too much. We've got to sneak past. Stay nice and quiet-like. Small guy can probably get by fine when he catches up, but we've got to quietly make our way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a door or a gate? Can we see past?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know those stockrooms, how you have an open half-door? You can see that there's a walk-in pantry, and through the walk-in pantry, there's a little cellar door. Wooden. It's got a circular dowel rod across it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see any honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but you know it's through that door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got an idea. That dowel rod looks like bamboo. I'm going to eat it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a tiny bottle of honey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can also smell a little bit of honey coming from the pantry room, as well. Not a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a tiny bottle of honey, right? Wasn't someone given a teeny-tiny bit of honey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got armpit honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I've got it, but I'm not there yet. But after I so beautifully and poetically murdered that man in the street, can I move the cart to the front of the tavern and rejoin them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can go over and take a little bit of time, get some leftover vegetables, and lead the horse, pulling the cart. These guys are figuring this out while you're doing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I pull out a palm-full of pit honey that's been smeared into my matted fur. I've got this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll do. I'm going to look around. Are there cups or something around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, there's a few, and there's a couple of empty pint glasses on Grog's table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put a little bit of the honey into the empty pint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (snores) "Yes, I am the Grand Poobah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and toss the cup past Grog into the pantry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To wake him up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quietly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to wake him up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I want to throw the cup into the pantry. Will that wake him up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you throw a cup. (crash, snorts) "That's my ale."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stare at the cup I just threw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, Waffle gets another little nosebleed. Roll for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't get advantage, I just have to roll for it, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Bear Eleven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see Waffle go, (sparking) and in a hex techy-looking glow, he goes, (zap) and teleports to the broken honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the pantry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the pantry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, my turn. I focus really hard on the broken honey--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you need a nosebleed. I hit him in the nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good. (straining)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More blood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go (boop) and squeeze out a little turd.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you teleported that turd to the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you get a little aggravated, you take a point in bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start figuring out if I can open this pantry door. I'm quietly working the pantry door to try and get downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a thick dowel rod across it, and it's got a chain on top of that, wrapping it up for extra security.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think much past this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, I've got this. I'm going to pick this chain's lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's just walk through the room. He's pretty drunk. All right, let's do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, make a stealthy...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because I'm a thief, could I consider that as a skill?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Considering that bears can have very stealthy picnics--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's make this a criminal roll. You're criminally trying to sneak past Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to Criminal Roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can I use my thief role to be stealthy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll allow it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the way past, I'm going to look and see if Grog has anything else on him that we can see or take or use.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're half hanging off his face right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll see if I can take them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll a criminal check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super fail.

lines.name: BRIAN, MATT
lines.text: (singing) Super fail, super fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) He super fucked up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you get the glasses off his face, he goes, "Oh shit. It's a fuzzy goliath!" And gets up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I growl at him. (roars)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (roars) He growls back.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (roar)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You want to wrestle?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's drunk, and he takes a big swing at you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I swing back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll a muscle roll. Roll with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fail. Success!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You successfully wrestle Grog. He's pretty drunk. He's not too hard to get to the ground. He's now on his back, squirming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pan pan pan pan? Pan pan da da da, pa-pa-pan pan dan. Panda.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Yes, I am Grand Poobah de Boink de Boink!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Panda?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You Poobah, too?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Panda!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Oh, brother!" (fake sobbing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cookie is picking the fuck out of the lock, right now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try to pick the lock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Diddly-diddly-do! That is a fail.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How is my progress of leading a horse across the street, slowly, by luring him with vegetables?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty good. I'd say by this point, you open the door to see Peddy on top of another guy that looks kind of like a panda, and you're not sure if it's bad or good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha, what does the flashback do? If I tell a flashback, it fixes that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you tell a flashback, you get to gain a point into criminal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then roll again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just adjusts your skill points. You still fail the roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a plan to get us in this door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What, are you having a problem again trying to get into a place with a lock? Like I said, the lady who raised me, she's pretty good at picking this stuff, too. In fact-- and I reach over and grab one of the little side bags they usually tie to me to carry stuff, and I pull out one of the lockpicks that Vex keeps stored on my side as a backup. And with my dexterous thief Trinket giant bear paws, try and maneuver these tiny little--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thin as a blade of grass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like trying to hold a cup with boxing gloves on. (grunts)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Countless hours, you have practiced in the middle of the night, just trying to learn how to pick a lock. Prove to us, Trinket, that you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clang) The whole thing snaps from the inside, because you're a bear, but it successfully goes (creak).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did I tell you? Mommy taught me good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, Grog goes, "Poobah, I missed you so--" (snores) and passes back out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put his sunglasses back on and pat him on the head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You do get an interesting essence from the sunglasses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh? Do they have the same essence as the stick, or something similar?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put them on your face, Peddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try them on once. (giggles) Nice. I'm going to try them on once. What do I see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look awesome. You see a bar, you see a tavern, and then right as you look past the cellar: holy shit, you can see past that cellar door! You see tripwires!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Peddy, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put on these human glasses, and I can see through walls.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And all you had to do was dry-hump that guy to get them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was not dry-humping him!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It looked like you were dry-humping him when I walked in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can now, if you choose to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dry-hump him? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You turn and look over your shoulder outside, out through the tavern exit, and you see a dwarf-sized woman turn and swing open the door of the tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Hey! I see you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Humans can't see movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I can see you, and I can understand what you're saying."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: But I didn't say anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What number am I thinking of?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I can hear you. I can't--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can't hear us; it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, humans can't see movement, but dwarves can, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "That's not-- okay, what are you all doing, all right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I go over. Do these still look functional?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Where did you-- wait a second."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do I recognize this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do. This is Tova, the werebear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (moans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Okay. All right, big guy. All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is two years after the Chroma Conclave? She lived!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the first time that you're seeing her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only reason was because of that ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheers)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's wearing a nice slick suit. It's very good. It's very clean-cut. Looks like she's got a nice festive pin.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is it all denim?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's a nice wool. It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look good, Tova. Snazzy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you think you're doing?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a celebration in the city. We're celebrating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Of course it's Vex's dumb bear."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Well, look. What kind of trouble are you getting into? You guys are going for the honey."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, that's absurd. I'm offended, personally.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: To judge without any evidence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want a cut?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all clearly don't know who you're talking to "and who you're getting involved with."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You just walked in five seconds ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I barely know you. We flirted in battle once, and then you went away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give it to the bears who truly need it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait a second, you're going to take all this honey and give it away?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Give it away to a bunch of people that are too lazy to get jobs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't we look needy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "No, look. These are needy people, and the High Bear Nation takes care of all of us, "all right? I will get plenty of honey out of this."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Beary Sanders. That honey is for us and us alone. We've earned that, okay? I don't want bears that haven't earned it getting a piece of what we've made.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, are you pulling our legs? What is this, a gingerhazing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You'll get your own little cut, and you'll all become members of the High Bear Nation."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of cut are you talking about here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Enough to last you for a while. I know how much honey is in there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "That's not how--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How's that sound?"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can you guarantee safe passage, should we choose to work with you in this endeavor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snickering)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, my makeup's running, and I didn't even put any on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you give us a minute to talk amongst ourselves, privately?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Bears, huddle up.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I think she likes me for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a lot of honey. We barely found that off your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We already got a hogshead of honey in his hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll last a meal. I don't think she understands how hungry we are.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, and that one's big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one only eats bamboo.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, but should he switch and start to eat honey, he could consume much of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is our heist. It's not hers. If she wants to get cut in, we could give her maybe a thousand percent. I don't know numbers, but a small amount.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If she helps us make our way in there--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I cut her throat--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can take her, no problem. We leave her tied up. Leave her a little hogshead of honey she can take back to her bear friends, and then we walk away scot-free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a vegan, I'm going to protest that we not harm any living creatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not harm, just knock unconscious and tie up, like you've done to every other thing we've come across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But heavens forbid we actually kill a human being on this adventure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god, no. Unless they're evil or an asshole or hurt my mom.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I did kill a human person, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you flash us back to that incident?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Well, it was 24 minutes ago, and I slit the throat of an innocent douchebag who was knocking too loud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you kill an innocent person?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He nearly discovered all of you, and I killed him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't believe you. You're heartless.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I do what it takes. Everything I do, I do it for the squad. Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get to put a point back into criminal for that. From bear to criminal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Me?
