lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are we agreed? Move forward as the squad, tag her along, and then when all's said and done, leave her behind with a bit of honey, and we move away with the lion's share.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Works for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, break! Tova, you've got yourself a deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Yeah? You an honest bear?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do I look like an honest bear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Do I look like an honest bear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "You look like a honey badger."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "We want to be careful. They're watching us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not watching us anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've already taken care of the security camera.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "All right, these tripwires, though. Anyone good at disarming? Yeah, we'll figure it out when we "get in. Let's go." You throw open the door and see a long hallway. Three haphazardly across the hall tripwires. They're long, cylindrical, glowing a bit green. You take a little bit of dust, Liam Las Vegas, and they show up a little bit better, then they go back to their dull, transparent look, like fishing wire.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I don't like this one bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does this look like the kind of thing that a thief-trained bear who has seen thieves do their work would have an inkling of how to disable it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That sounds so familiar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to think up bear puns for all of our sayings, and I couldn't find any natural ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The internet will barrage us with them when we're done.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There's going to be a lot, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be nothing on Twitter other than bear puns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I go back into the bag of thieves' tools left over from Vex and pull out what I think might work. I take a look at the mechanisms for the trip wire. Two and a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice. Okay, you go up to the first one, and you see an energy box off to the side. It's got a washer keeping it closed. You tilt that to the side, see the mechanical mechanism on the inside. (pop)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I turn around with a big goofy smile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got through tripwire one. Two more to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Arcane magic dispelled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone have anything else they could help me with on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can grow a tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. I walk up to it carefully, gingerly, slowly. I piddle on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sizzling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's some hot pee, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing? I piddle on it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (weak sizzling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I really thought that would work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you hack this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can try and hack it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can try and hack it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and hack one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, roll two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't hack! You're going to be hacking an actual tripwire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a little box. You go in. Instead of messing with the mechanical trip wire, you see almost a microchip on the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I find an off switch and click it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You touch it, and it goes (zap).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hacked it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get behind me. If anything goes bad, tell Vex I love her.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or Vex?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Who's Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he said Vax. I think he wants us to tell Vax--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We'll tell Vax that you love her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You and you take points in criminal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I turn around and look at the group with a terrible happy-bear smile.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova's like, "All right. Good work." You get down to the other end of the hall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we walk, I'm going to whisper to-- what's his name?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Cookie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Think she's going to double-cross us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your ass hair. I need you to be ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. What's the signal? I need signals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steveland Cleamer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Steveland Cleamer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steveland Cleamer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice and cleaned.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, not that. Remember the picture you drew last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's bring it home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see the spoils of our work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What happens with the tripwires?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get to the other end of the hall, unharmed by a swarm of bees. That's what would have happened if you would've tripped them.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We would've given them

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are also four little baskets on either side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any Skittles in it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any honey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, remember that piece of paper that we got from that guy earlier?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Buford. Bloomford.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Honestly, I'm only thinking about honey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really about honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't read. Tova?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Okay. Yeah, sure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we sure we want to share this with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's getting an equal-- she's getting all the share we promised her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I already know what it is. I helped them to design it. I just don't know the actual code "they ended up going with. Here, look." She goes over to it, and she passes her hand over it, and it goes (buzzing) and starts glowing, and then holographic fish appear in the center of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Madness coming out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. What is wrong with you?!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is the greatest thing I've ever seen in my life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need these?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, should I read this out loud?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Via Tova reading this to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I help him sound it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys have to share one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, you guys should do this. You're the brains.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Matt and I will share this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 'Then the stupid, expensive-- ' I'm so proud I married you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hell yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Signed, Buford T. Justice, head of security.'

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (electronic song in Korean)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An orange in each, except for two in the pink, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An orange in each, except for two in the pink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Someone has to wear the bear hands, because I made them get them, so it's even funnier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, I think you should only get them if you have the bear hands on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One at a time. You've got to have the bear hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An orange in each basket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And two in the pink.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You've got it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: An orange in each...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the hell are they singing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got it from South Korea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any guards coming?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. No guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have unlimited time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He looped the footage. He did pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two oranges in the pink and one in every other one.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh god. What do I need?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! No, he's out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Las Vegas, come on! Focus!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm trying, man. I've got fucking bear hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more orange for the pink. Is that all we need?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, you damn wolverine. Get the thing!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm waiting for one to open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Las Vegas, you can do this!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Goddamn, it's not opening its mouth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, as you start getting irritated, you get a point in bear, Liam Las Vegas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have never been so proud of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. It's the fishing rod that's doing it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This thing is warped!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do I always get a warped one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a disappointment to everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Liam Las Vegas. It's got to be orange.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam, you fucking asshole!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm getting so frustrated that I'm going to start freaking out and hitting the doors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the doors behind? Take a point in bear.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: None of them are opening!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the pink!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two in the pink! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And with that, the hex-shaped doors open up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mad bastard.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Damn. That was hard, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the mystery? Mysterious. Yeah, that's good. Behind the door, you see a dimly lit cellar room. A waft of cool air blasts by you. You see a few bar tables that have been tossed over; clearly left in here for storage. A few bags of grain. And in the middle, on discarded bar tables-- there are three tables. The first one has a little note that says "Slayer's Cake." It's got a nice couple of small half-barrels of honey. The second one says "Reginald's daughter." Whatever her name is. Has a note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might have been Amelia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ariana? Whatever. Third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The writing isn't very good. The name begins with an A and then scribbles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see four torch sconces on the walls, lightly puttering. You follow, and you see, holy shit! Victor brought way too much fucking honey, and the entire edge of the cellar room is filled with weird heads of honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waffle, this is it. This is our father's dream.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything we've worked for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have reached easy street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just honey. Everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are those sconces looking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Precarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's in them? Is it magical light?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, it looks like torch sconces that they dipped in kerosene. A long-burning torch; they probably lit them when they were bringing in the honey, and then walked out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do any of them look viably close to dropping embers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is one that's right over the table of Victor's that looks like it's a miracle it hasn't honestly exploded yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's grab the honey and run.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I've got a cart outside waiting, with a horse and everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Code Sad Bear! We've got to move

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grabbing honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is Tova still with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova is. She sees the same thing. She's a little confused as to why you're acting this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I turn around to her. Tova, all this gray honey shit is explosive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! He's crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Why? Why would you-- who would do that?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The more you try and question his motives, the more he makes you more like him. Keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She walks over, takes a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I immediately take the fire staff I've been carrying and throw it as far as I can down the opposite hallway, away from this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: De Rolo Roller.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Blah-blah-blah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, while this is happening, I reach over and go: Hey, Cookie. If I buy you a new hat, could I borrow yours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (singing) If you want to see paradise...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to take the top hat and place it just over the heavy collection of Victor's honey beneath where the sconce is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Are you still wearing the sunglasses, Peddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get a little bit of an advantage, because at this time, you look up, and you see through the roof of the cellar very quick, shadowed movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone's above us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd better move. I'm going to create a distraction. Let's get this honey out into the cart right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, moving honey as fast as we can into the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, while we're moving, I'm going to take a big fucking bite of honey on the move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put a point back into bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do the same, as well.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: While they're doing that, I'm going to move some honey onto the thing, and I'm going to wink at Tova and say: I thought I told you that we won't stop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova looks up, she sees them, and she goes, "Shit, it's the Bearracuda!"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They're not with you? (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I immediately glance around. They came through the ceiling; are there any of the sconces that look close to being--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, there's one on the left closest to the door. Fractured and got knocked over by one of the splintering floorboards and is now swinging above all of the honey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can't-- and I point to the ninja bears coming our way and the ones that just entered-- Handle it! And I go for the swinging sconce board to see if I can clap it out with my bear paws and put out the flame.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll for bear.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Am I able to get the cart of honey--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unfortunately, as you try to stamp it out with the board, the other floorboard catches on fire, and now you have two flame sources.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Can I start trying to make it out with the de Rolo Roller to the cart? Take the honey out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got this, guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you try to roll it out, you have two bear ninjas swiping above you. What do you do?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I try to run past them as fast as I can, and if one of them gets too close to me, I can try to swipe him on my way past.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, use your nimble bear abilities as a honey badger. Straight bear roll.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, just one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's a fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Point into bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go for one of the ninjas and attack with my strength. Panda strength.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a success. That's not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's trying to fight you off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he's there, I hit him with the tree stick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll for criminal to use the stick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Unfortunately, as you're sandwiched up against him when you try to use it, you don't really get good leverage, so you go (bop) with a dead stick. It doesn't really work. It's still forcing against you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Not your first time dealing with a dead stick, is it, Peddy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you guys doing? You've got the ninjas kind of warded off. Two more coming in from where they were after Liam Las Vegas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Have they abandoned me, so I can keep going and try to get the cart outside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they're not too distracted with you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to keep pushing the de Rolo Roller out to the thing and load the honey into the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing that upstairs is Grog, two people that we've knocked out, another drunk guy who's passed out in the bar, and god knows who's nearby, and the amount of Victor honey that's in here, I'm focusing on trying to put the fires out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to pee on the fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'm one of the few that hasn't peed, so I probably have a full tank. My paws are scalded from patting the flames out. I lean back and try and get as much of an arc as I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Roll for bear.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: That's a bear thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That's a four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unfortunately, as you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Performance anxiety!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you pee shy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket apparently is pee shy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You back up, and as you back up, you bump into the table of Victor's honey, and it goes (crash) and spills flammable honey all across the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not going well!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other two Bearracudas come in, squaring off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck this! Come here, you. Everybody run! And I head towards the Bearracudas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's fucking do this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for bear attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you take one of them. Two big haymaker swipes. They try to block with their bear katanas and miss, and he gets two big gashes right across his face. He's a little disoriented. You've got one more that's in there. He's pretty unattended.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have something I can do, but it's not going to be pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waffle, hack the system!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take the fez of honey, and I throw it at the Bearracuda.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I don't know what not throwing a hat full of honey looks like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Backs into one of the torch "sconches." Sconces. Lights on fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to roll, kids.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She turns to everyone and goes, "Run!" and takes off through the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I teleport towards the cart.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm on the cart with the reins in my hands, ready to go. I'm out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Waffle is gone. You see the fire getting closer and closer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to head for the door, and on my way, I'm going to grab Tova by the hair and pull her back in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there still Bearracudas?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One is on fire. The other is distracted by your scratching, and there was one that Tova was squaring off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But she just got pulled through the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She got pulled through the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say: I hear my father's voice in the morning. And I dive at the remaining Bearracuda and plow them down into the flammable honey on the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll for bear attack. Also roll for your muscle strength, so you get advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fail, fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You scootch back. Roll to avoid the flame.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So now it's you and Tova. You're out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trails of honey, are they heading towards the large--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whoosh) Peddy's out! Tova's like, "What the fuck?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to try to use whatever bear strength I have to shove them forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, roll for bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You make one more bounding leap as the explosion blows you out of the cellar door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I close my eyes and in the back of my head, go: I hope you're within about a hundred feet of me, wherever you are, Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flames die down. You look in the hallway, and there, a little singed, flaming fur, with some bald spots, is Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still alive.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Get out here! Can I yell "get out here" at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Am I conscious?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're unconscious.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wake up and then get out here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means she's not within a hundred feet of me, for the love of god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No bear left behind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are the ninjas still around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ninjas all seem to be dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Snout-to-snout resuscitation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll for...

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: BPR?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Roll for BPR.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Ed Harris in the Abyss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (heavy breathing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one's sure what exactly is happening.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I cover the horse's eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket, you do wake up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket, if you'd died, I would be so upset.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Confused bear. What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time, Liam Las Vegas, you see all the guards running up the alley, coming in this direction. The Sun Kissed Tavern is up in flames right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I fucking gently and humanely encourage the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're taking off with the honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a thank you to Peddy as I get up, I grab Peddy by the shoulders and push Peddy up onto the cart with everybody else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova runs over. She jumps into the back of the cart. "Come on!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hoppity-hop! Come on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've earned it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never forget you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone asks, we have no idea where it came from.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I yell down: Tell her to fucking remember Hunter's Mark! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do, constantly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With a crack of the whips, you all speed off down into an empty alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could've been beautiful, kid. Good luck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are a great High Bear."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (moans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (moans) The horse and buggy pulls off, a few rogue cabbages and vegetables falling off the end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can turn over a new leaf.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: But on the other side of that leaf, there isn't going to be honey, and for us, it's about the honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show me the honey.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Show me the honey, honey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tova, I'm sorry I tried to kill you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Y'all are all right. I'll talk to the High Bear "committee and make sure you guys don't have any heat on your tails after this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're sure you don't want to come with us? See the world, sample honey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I'm ready for a little honey vacation."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck does that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I honestly don't know.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I think she means rehab.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Oh, my darling bear. Oh no! What happened?" She turns and looks at Grog. "Grog."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I fall on the ground and go belly-up and go, (piteous moaning).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was terrifying! Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to break canon and take Trinket with us across the nation! Goddamn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket wouldn't leave.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We would've gotten some strongly worded emails.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Well, Trinket had quite a time."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sometimes, there's a bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good work, bears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy fucking shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we fucked up canon too much. That's all right, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucked up canon? Tova's alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova's alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tova's alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I meant to text her and email her about it, and I kept forgetting, so sorry, Tova.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I got a text that she has begun litigation against us already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tova's alive!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Thank you, Grant, for making an amazing game, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you watched this and were like, "holy shit, now "I want to play Honey Heist," it's free to download. You can download it off his website, which I believe is granthowitt.com.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Single sheet, in very large text.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it is a two-page rulebook. One page for everyone, and one page for the DM. And there is a super-secret spells list, if you are a Patreon backer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of the spells that I accidentally got would've turned one of us into secretly two bears hiding in a bear costume, and we popped out and became two bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys were actually supposed to find a trenchcoat at some point and get that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And get two bears in a trenchcoat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's two bears in a trenchcoat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking for extra content like that, he offers that on his Patreon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But yeah, there's a whole other optional-- you can roll to have cantrips and things like that as an added dimension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do they get the battle board from tonight's game?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That you can get on Amazon Prime!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With that song?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find that theme on iTunes for download.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I came across this one and was like, "Shit, it says it plays a song? "I don't want anything that plays music-- no, I want something that plays music." Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to come up with a million codes and gave up, so that's how that letter came out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll talk about it on Talks Machina.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Talks on Tuesday with Marisha and whoever else is not working.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I guess we'll see all of you guys at PAX.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Special thanks to our sponsor tonight: Marvel Puzzle Quest. Go to bit.ly/MarvelCrit, capital M, capital C. Make sure that they know that Critical Role sent you. And don't forget, also, that you can battle with some of your favorite X-Men, like Rogue or Gambit. That's all I've got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: [music]
